Noob question. For moo moo guaranteed 6.8%  after 20 days it would give me the coupons to top up for the differences in yield?
Hi. Can i check  for UOB one card quarterly spending  does it look at calendar month or statement month? (ie. if i spend today and it gets posted tomorrow  does it count for March spending or Feb?)
Thanks! So spending today if posted tomorrow counts for spending in march right?
Technically yes  but many of reported that their top up isn’t 6.8%
Probably has to do with day count and slippage.To be fair. Sometimes even bank promo deposit rates won’t be accurate to the last cent. Maybe off by a few dollars.

Not really. If they are topping up the difference those shouldn’t matter. So in actual fact  they should be take the actual 6.8% profits and deduct from the earnings  and give you the coupon if they state they will make up the difference.

Not really. it is the person who manually calculate manually don’t know how to calculate until I told her how to calculate.The formula is simple. Total amount as advertise minus daily interest collected during the period. That shall be the cash coupon amount.

Hi Chris and all  I have subscribed to moo moo plus cash plus before. And they keep accumulating additional interests there today. But I have not signed up for the latest 6.8 % promo yet. Can I sign up for it (as in press start now) on 25th to say put 70K for 40 days then? Or would my 40 days have already started before I clicked on “start now” since I already have existing cash plus?
Depends on your fund level before 1 Feb 2024. Once you registered  Need fresh funds on top of it to qualify.Timer starts once you qualify
